comment.author: 105850035@N05
comment._content: Note that this one man (who appears to be a resident) seems to be the only one who cares about keeping the exterior areas clean.  I really believe that when you just give someone something and they don't work for it, they don't care about it or take care of it.  I've been a renter my whole life and in some pretty low rent areas and I always pitched in and helped keep things clean outside, it's sad so many people have so little character to do something so simple
